head.title: Contact Information During School Closure - Argyle Central School District

meta.content: To simplify lines of communication during the school closure, the district has created a centralized point of contact for questions and concerns. Please email info@argylecsd.org and we will respond to you promptly.

meta.name: description
meta.content: To simplify lines of communication during the school closure, the district has created a centralized point of contact for questions and concerns. Please email info@argylecsd.org and we will respond to you promptly.

nav.div: Argyle Central School District » News » What's New » Contact Information During School Closure

img.span:
To simplify lines of communication during the school closure, the district has created a centralized point of contact for questions and concerns.
Please email info@argylecsd.org and we will respond to you promptly.
As always, please feel free to call our main office as well for any needs, but be mindful that we have lowered the number of staff members/ working hours to accommodate a healthy workforce occupancy and may not be able to answer calls immediately.

div.div:
5023 State Route 40, Argyle, NY 12809
Phone (518) 638-8243 | Fax 518-638-6373
